vocabInfos.lsjDefs:
ἐνέχω,
hold or keep fast within, χόλον ἐνέχειν τινί harbour a grudge against one, [Refs 5th c.BC+]
__II passive, with future and aorist middle (see. below), to be held, caught, entangled in, with dative, τῇ πάγῃ [Refs 5th c.BC+]
__II.2 metaphorically, ἐ. ἀπορίῃσι [Refs 5th c.BC+]; ἐν θώματι ἐνέσχετο was seized with wonder, [Refs 5th c.BC+]
__II.3 to be liable or subject to, οὐ δικαίοις Ζεὺς ἐνέξεται λόγοις [Refs 5th c.BC+]; πράγμασιν, λειτουργίαις, [Refs 2nd c.AD+]
__II.3.b in legal formulae, ἐν ἐπιάρῳ κ᾽ ἐνέχοιτο [Refs 6th c.BC+]; ἐ. ἀρᾷ Διός [Refs 5th c.BC+]; ζημίᾳ, αἰτίᾳ, [Refs 5th c.BC+]; νοθείᾳ in an imputation of bastardy, [Refs 2nd c.BC+]
__II.4 in good sense, ἐνέχεσθαι ἀγγελίᾳ meet with a message, [Refs 5th c.BC+]
__II.5 in aorist, come to a standstill, ἔν τινι [Refs 5th c.BC+]
__III intransitive, enter in, pierce, εἴς τι [Refs 5th c.BC+]
__III.2 to be urgent against, τινί [LXX+NT]

relatedNos._zh_tw_Gloss: 在, 裡, 藉著, 靠 ...
relatedNos._zh_Gloss: 在, 里, 借着, 靠 ...

vocabInfos.shortDef: to oppose, be hostile toward, bear a grudge against; (passive) to be burdened
vocabInfos.mediumDef:
to oppose, be hostile toward, bear a grudge against; (passive) to be burdened
to hold within; to fix upon;, in NT intransitive (i.e. χόλον) to entertain a grudge against, Mk. 6:19; to be exasperated against, Lk. 11:53; passive to be entangled, held fast in, burdened Gal. 5:1*
vocabInfos._es_Definition: sentir resentimiento en contra de, guardarle rencor, ser hostil hacia ; estar sujeto a (voz pasiva)
vocabInfos._zh_tw_Definition:
1) (主動) 對某人有怨氣 (可 6:19; 路 11:53)
2) (被動) 受制於, 負荷 (加 5:1)
vocabInfos._zh_Definition:
1) (主动) 对某人有怨气 (可 6:19; 路 11:53)
2) (被动) 受制于, 负荷 (加 5:1)
vocabInfos._vi_Definition: có trong, giữ trong; giữ mối hận thù với ai đó; được vướng mắc. ἐν (G1722) + ἔχω (G2192)
